info.name: Compliance Master API
info.description: AI-powered document processing and ISO template generation

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy

formdata.description: Document file to parse (DOCX, PDF, etc.)

request.description: Upload a document and extract text content using Docling

body.raw:
{
  "document_text": "Quality Management Procedure\nDocument Number: QMP-001\nRevision: 1.0\nEffective Date: 2025-01-01\nDepartment: Quality Assurance\nAuthor: John Doe\nPurpose: To establish quality procedures\nScope: All manufacturing processes",
  "fields_to_extract": [
    "document_title",
    "document_number",
    "revision_number",
    "effective_date",
    "department",
    "author",
    "purpose",
    "scope"
  ]
}

request.description: Extract specific fields from document text using IBM Granite LLM

body.raw:
{
  "document_type": "quality_system_record",
  "extracted_fields": {
    "document_title": "Quality Management Procedure",
    "document_number": "QMP-001",
    "revision_number": "1.0",
    "effective_date": "2025-01-01",
    "department": "Quality Assurance",
    "author": "John Doe",
    "purpose": "To establish quality procedures",
    "scope": "All manufacturing processes"
  },
  "iso_standard": "ISO 9001:2015"
}
